discussion.content: C: Workflow Actions, Heroku, and Flow cannot be used to monitor record deletions. Process Builder can be used to monitor record deletions and send notifications to scientists. The administrator should use Process Builder to set up the automation solution to send notifications when a record is deleted, and maintain the scientist's discovery information.

When configuring a change set, which two practices should an administrator adhere to in order to ensure a successful deployment to production? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Clone a change set to add forgotten dependent components to an uploaded change set.
choices.A: When deploying a new record type, ensure the new record type is the only component in the change set.
choices.B: Run deployment validations on the change set in the sandbox prior to uploading to production.
choices.C: Add permissions and access settings to outbound change sets in addition to the dependent component list.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
Use this for reference - https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.changesets_best_practices.htm&type=5

A is nonsense.
B can trip you up, but you would run validation on the Inbound change set just before it is deployed (as the test for the change set needs to happen in the org you are deploying to).

B. Run deployment validations on the change set in the sandbox prior to uploading to production.
C. Add permissions and access settings to outbound change sets in addition to the dependent component list.


Yes, that is also a valid practice for ensuring a successful deployment. Cloning a change set can be helpful if the administrator realizes they forgot to include a necessary component or dependency in the original change set. They can clone the change set, add the missing components, and upload it to production. However, it's important to note that cloning a change set can sometimes introduce errors, so it should be used with caution.

A. Use Field-Level Security to control data access.

This requirement involves controlling the visibility of specific fields on a custom object based on the user's profile. Field-level security is the best way to accomplish this. By setting the appropriate field-level security, the administrator can control which fields are visible to each user profile. Additionally, both Marketing and Support users should be able to report on all data, so the field-level security should not restrict access to the data, only the visibility of specific fields. Dynamic Forms and record types are not required to meet this requirement,

choices.D: Create two record types and two page layouts.
choices.B: Set up Dynamic Forms to conditionally show data.
choices.C: Make a permission set with a Muting permission.
choices.A: Use Field-Level Security to control data access.
